title: All the News We Covered This Week
description: Oprah's 111th book club pick, Iowa's librarian criminalization bill, the best new cozy mysteries, and bonus news!
author: S. Zainab Williams
excerpt: Oprah's 111th book club pick, Iowa's librarian criminalization bill, the best new cozy mysteries, and bonus news!

Zainab would like to think she bleeds ink but the very idea makes her feel faint. She writes fantasy and horror, and is currently clutching a manuscript while groping in the dark. html:
Today in Books

Oprah's 111th book club pick, Iowa's librarian criminalization bill, the best new cozy mysteries, and bonus news!

S. Zainab would like to think she bleeds ink but the very idea makes her feel faint. She writes fantasy and horror, and is currently clutching a manuscript while groping in the dark. Find her on Twitter: @szainabwilliams.

View All posts by S. Zainab Williams

Welcome to Today in Books. In this weekend edition, a look at all the news Book Riot covered this week.

The comments section is moderated according to our community guidelines. Please check them out so we can maintain a safe and supportive community of readers!
